replies.body: I don't see any difference with the live version.

While taking in consideration the last champion releases (Senna, Aphelios and Sett - to name a few) - if Nautilus was released this days - his abilities would look a lot like that. I can even envision multiple topics opened the next day - about Nautilus being so broken. ðŸ˜
